# update()

**Instance Method**

Updates the fetched results.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency mutating func update()
```

## Discussion

SwiftUI calls this function before rendering a view’s [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/body-8kl5o] to ensure the view has the most recent fetched results.

## Getting the fetched results

- **wrappedValue**: The fetched results of the fetch request.

items.description: The fetched results of the fetch request.
